text: Ase loka pratyeka thikani apamanita hota rahatila, tathapi allahacya kinva lokancya asrayakhali asatila tara gosta vegali. Matra he loka allahacya prakopasa patra tharale ani tyancyavara daridyra ani durdasa takali geli. He asasathi jhale ki he loka allahacya ayatinca inkara karita hote, ani paigambaranci nahaka hatya karita hote. Ha mobadala tyancya ajnabhangaca ani maryada para karanyaca ahe
